title: "Apiiro aims to fix critical cloud risks in runtime"
excerpt: "Apiiro on Thursday announced the expansion of its platform from code to runtime. The company claims that its cloud-native platform can now connect application risks in runtime back to the source code to fix critical risks in the cloud and reduce remediation time by 90%."
